com.myronmarston.music.settings
Class AbstractVoiceOrSection<M extends AbstractVoiceOrSection,O extends AbstractVoiceOrSection>

java.lang.Object
  com.myronmarston.music.settings.AbstractVoiceOrSection<M,O>
Type Parameters:
M - the main type--Voice or Section
O - the other type--Voice, if this is a Section, or Section, if this is a voice
Direct Known Subclasses:
Section, Voice
public abstract class AbstractVoiceOrSection<M extends AbstractVoiceOrSection,O extends AbstractVoiceOrSection>
extends java.lang.Object

An abstract class containing a common interface and common logic shared by the Voice and Section classes.

Method Detail

getFractalPiece

public FractalPiece getFractalPiece()
Gets the FractalPiece that this Voice or Section is a part of.

Returns:
The FractalPiece that this Voice or Section is a part of

getVoiceSections

public VoiceSectionList getVoiceSections()
Gets a list of VoiceSections. This is guarenteed to never return null. The list of VoiceSections will be a subset of all the VoiceSections for the entire FractalPiece. Specifically, if this is a Voice, the list will contain each VoiceSection for this Voice, and for each Section. If this is a Section, the list will contain each VoiceSection for this Section, and for each Voice.

Returns:
the list of VoiceSections

getListOfMainType

protected abstract java.util.List<M> getListOfMainType()
Returns the FractalPiece's list of this type. When implemented by the Voice class, this should return a list of all Voices in the fractal piece. When implemented by the Section class, this should return a list of al the Sections in the fractal piece.

Returns:
a List of Voices (if the implementing type is Voice) or a list of Sections (if the implementing type is Section)

getListOfOtherType

protected abstract java.util.List<O> getListOfOtherType()
When implemented by the Voice class, this should return a list of all the Sections in the fractal piece. When implemented by the Section class, this should return a list of all the Voices in the fractal piece.

Returns:
a List of Voices (if the implementing type is Section) or a List of Sections (if the implementing type is Voice)

getHashMapKeyForOtherTypeIndex

protected abstract VoiceSectionHashMapKey getHashMapKeyForOtherTypeIndex(int index)
Creates a VoiceSectionHashMapKey, combining this object with an object of the other type, based on the index.

Parameters:
index - The index in the list of the other type to combine with to create the hash map key
Returns:
A VoiceSectionHashMapKey that can be used to get a specific VoiceSection

setSelfSimilaritySettingsOnAllVoiceSections

public void setSelfSimilaritySettingsOnAllVoiceSections(java.lang.Boolean applyToPitch,
                                                        java.lang.Boolean applyToRhythm,
                                                        java.lang.Boolean applyToVolume)
Updates the self-similarity settings of all voice sections.

Parameters:
applyToPitch - new value; pass null to leave existing values
applyToRhythm - new value; pass null to leave existing values
applyToVolume - new value; pass null to leave existing values
